title: Minutes of Tainan City Governmentâ€™s 428th Municipal Administrative Meeting 3/3/2020
content: Mayor’s Remarks:1. In light of the continuous development of the COVID-19 outbreak and its impact on local businesses, the government decides to cut down the rent for shop owners and venders for city markets and venues managed by outsourced partners.2. The Economic Development Bureau should work with the vendors to upgrade anti-virus equipment and improve relevant procedures in traditional markets as soon as possible.Announcements 1. The Bureau of Social Affairs’ report on establishing a friendly and safe child care environment. (refer to written sources for details)Decision: Approved for reference filingMayor’s Remarks:I appreciate the presentation from the Bureau of Social Affairs. In the future, when dealing with child abuse cases, we will not only punish the child care facility involved, but will also include the whole handling process in the performance assessment of the bureau and individual staff members. Let’s work together to protect our children.2. Bureau of Urban Development’s report on the completion and opening of the Hele Plaza. (refer to written sources for details)Decision: Approved for reference filing
